flawed_nl_solution:
The lawyer worked 50*2=<<50*2=100>>100 hours out of court
So he worked 100+50=<<100+50=150>>150 hours total
That means the hourly time cost 150*100=$<<150*100=51000>>51000
Adding the upfront cost it was 51000+1000=$<<51000+1000=52000>>52000
His brother paid half so he paid 52000/2=$<<52000/2=26000>>26000
#### 26000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15000, not 51000. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
